text: Overkill is a thrash metal band from New Jersey. They formed in 1980 and have played music since then. ==Studio albums== * Feel the Fire (1985) * Taking Over (1987) * Under The Influence (1988) * The Years of Decay (1989) * Horrorscope (1991) * I Hear Black (1993) * W.F.O. (1994) * The Killing Kind (1996) * From the Underground and Below (1997) * Necroshine (1999) * Bloodletting (2000) * Killbox 13 (2003) * ReliXIV (2005) * Immortalis (2007) * Ironbound (2010) * The Electric Age (2012) * White Devil Armory (2014) * The Grinding Wheel (2017) * The Wings of War (2019) * Scorched (2023) ==References== ==Other websites== * Official OVERKILL Site * BORN IN THE BASEMENT- Thrash Metal/ Overkill History * Overkill artwork archive from Rat Skates Category:1980s American music groups Category:1990s American music groups Category:2000s American music groups Category:2010s American music groups Category:Musical groups from New Jersey Category:American heavy metal bands Category:Thrash metal bands
title: Overkill
